statements: SELECT * FROM ab_testing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, subject_line FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE subject_line='Promotional Campaign';
SELECT design FROM ab_testing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, subject_line, content FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE content LIKE '%New Arrivals%';
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_campaigns ORDER BY subject_line ASC, campaign_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT subject_line, content FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE subject_line ILIKE '%special%' AND content ILIKE '%offer%';
SELECT campaign_id, subject_line, content FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE length(subject_line) > 50 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT design FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE length(design) < 100;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890AB';
SELECT * FROM EmailSubjects;
SELECT subject_line FROM EmailSubjects WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT id, subject_line, campaign_id FROM EmailSubjects WHERE campaign_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, opens, clicks FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(emails_sent) AS total_emails_sent FROM CampaignMetrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM EmailSubjects;
SELECT id, subject_line, campaign_id FROM EmailSubjects WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT subject_line, opens, clicks FROM EmailSubjects JOIN CampaignMetrics ON EmailSubjects.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id;
SELECT subject_line, opens, clicks FROM EmailSubjects JOIN CampaignMetrics ON EmailSubjects.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id ORDER BY opens DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS email_subjects_count, AVG(opens) AS avg_opens FROM EmailSubjects JOIN CampaignMetrics ON EmailSubjects.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM email_subject_lines;
SELECT subject_line FROM email_subject_lines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT design_name, id FROM email_designs ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, content FROM email_content WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM email_subject_lines WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, subject_line FROM email_subject_lines ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM email_content WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT design_name FROM email_designs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, content FROM email_content WHERE content LIKE '%promo%';
SELECT * FROM email_subject_lines WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM email_subject_lines;
SELECT content_text FROM email_content WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT design_description FROM email_designs ORDER BY design_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(conversion_rate) AS max_conversion_rate FROM ab_test_results;
SELECT subject_line, design_description FROM email_subject_lines JOIN email_designs ON email_subject_lines.subject_id = email_designs.design_id;
SELECT subject_id, subject_line FROM email_subject_lines WHERE subject_id = 1;
SELECT content_text FROM email_content WHERE content_id = 3;
SELECT design_description FROM email_designs WHERE design_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT subject_line, content_text, design_description, conversion_rate FROM email_subject_lines AS esl JOIN email_content AS ec ON esl.subject_id = ec.content_id JOIN email_designs AS ed ON ec.content_id = ed.design_id JOIN ab_test_results AS abr ON ed.design_id = abr.design_id WHERE abr.test_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, target_audience FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subject_lines ORDER BY subject_line_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, subject_line_text, is_tested, test_results FROM subject_lines WHERE is_tested = true;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_audience='Marketing';
SELECT subject_line_text, test_results FROM subject_lines WHERE is_tested=true;
SELECT email_title, content FROM email_content WHERE campaign_id=2;
SELECT design_name, design_image_path FROM designs WHERE design_id IN (1, 3, 5);
